name: Saturn Smash
storyline: The evil LastCat has hidden Sega Saturns all over the server! As part of the LastCat Repellant Force, it is your job to find all the Saturns, and to smash them. Along your way, you will find many video game characters, retro game resellers, and bizarre fellows trying to thwart your progress. What's more, LastCat himself is roaming the screens, trying to make your journey end prematurely.
summary: A new game for the NES
